channel.title: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left
channel.description:
I manually installed Whonix 10 into Qubes R3 following the intructions here https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1195.0.html?PHPSESSID=cpjuieslvnti14fspka2rsd3lgqkm5f4
Whonix Gateway installed without any problems using yum, but with the Whonix workstation I after some time I got a message that the system had run out of disk space.
I have since tried yum clean, clean all, autoremove, remove etc in Dom0 but I can't get rid of the partially installed package. So I am unable to try reinstalling Whonix Workstation.
How do I get rid of it. Any suggestions gratefuly received...
Thanks

item.title: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left
item.dc:creator: nrgaway
item.description:
@JPL was able to resolve this issue. I had posted a solution on Qubes mailing list
https://groups.google.com/forum/#!topic/qubes-users/4xg0E27diGA

If yum still states there is an incomplete transaction, first yum the command it requests to be run; something like 'yum clean-transaction' then try (change template name as required):

yum --setopt=tsflags=noscripts remove qubes-template-whonix-gateway-experimental

Read full topic
item.source: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left

item.title: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left
item.dc:creator: bullabdomen
item.description:
best is,if you haven’t tweak much your Qubes Install,to do a clean reinstallation of Qubes ,starting from 0.

I would also recommend to wait for the Upgrade,wich would give you a slicy more stable distrib.

Read full topic
item.source: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left

item.title: Manual install in Qubes 3.0 failed - now no space left

item.description:
I manually installed Whonix 10 into Qubes R3 following the intructions here https://www.whonix.org/forum/index.php/topic,1195.0.html?PHPSESSID=cpjuieslvnti14fspka2rsd3lgqkm5f4

Whonix Gateway installed without any problems using yum, but with the Whonix workstation I after some time I got a message that the system had run out of disk space.

I have since tried yum clean, clean all, autoremove, remove etc in Dom0 but I can’t get rid of the partially installed package. So I am unable to try reinstalling Whonix Workstation.

How do I get rid of it. Any suggestions gratefuly received…

Thanks
